heading: HB03813
0: AN ACT PENALIZING ALL ADVERTISING AGENCIES THAT EXPLOIT WOMEN AND GLORIFY SEXUAL VIOLENCE IN THEIR ADVERTISEMENTS
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03813
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PENALIZING ALL ADVERTISING AGENCIES THAT EXPLOIT WOMEN AND GLORIFY SEXUAL VIOLENCE IN THEIR ADVERTISEMENTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-09-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. De Venecia (039 2016-10-19)2. Bulut-Begtang (088 2017-05-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-02-27
          -initial consideration of HB Nos. 01471, 02664, 02850 and 03813
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-08-08
          -The Committee Secretariat was tasked to draft a bill in substitution of HB Numbered 1471,2592, 2664, 2850 and 5153. HB No. 3813 will be tackled separately because it covers another subject matter and HB No. 5584 will also be taken up separately per request of the author, because his proposal's coverage includes lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender group (LGBT) and not specific to VAWC.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2016-10-04
